name:
Fire Emblem™ Echoes: 
Shadows of Valentia: Update
formal_name:
Fire Emblem™ Echoes:
Shadows of Valentia: Update
description:
An update for "Fire Emblem™ Echoes: Shadows of Valentia" is now available from Nintendo eShop.

All customers who own a copy of “Fire Emblem™ Echoes: Shadows of Valentia” should download the update.

This will update the software to Version 1.1 with the following amendments:

- Various bugs have been fixed in order to provide a smoother gaming experience.

• Once the update has been downloaded, it will be installed automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused, and recommend downloading this update to ensure a smooth game experience.
